headline: Here are the latest companies warning about tariffs
summary: Executives are increasingly warning about tariffs either in their earnings releases or on the earnings calls. Exxon Mobil (XOM), Eaton (ETN), and Apollo Global Management (APO) leaders are just a few of the latest to do so. In the video above, Market Domination Overtime Anchor Julie Hyman recaps what they said. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here. Note: Apollo Global Management is the parent company of Yahoo Finance.

summary: ETN's first-quarter earnings beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate and it continues to benefit from rising organic sales.

headline: Eaton: A Solid Q1, But Signs Growth Will Decelerate Cap Upside
summary: Eaton Corporation's strong fundamentals face valuation concerns and slowing growth. Click for my ETN earnings update and a look ahead at its growth prospects.

headline: Eaton: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Dublin-based company said it had net income of $2.45. Earnings, adjusted for amortization costs and restructuring costs, were $2.72 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Eaton: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Dublin-based company said it had net income of $2.45. Earnings, adjusted for amortization costs and restructuring costs, were $2.72 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: Eaton Reports Record First Quarter 2025 Results, with Accelerating Organic Growth; Raises Full-Year Organic Growth Guidance
summary: DUBLIN, May 02, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton Corporation plc (NYSE:ETN) today announced that first quarter 2025 earnings per share were $2.45, a first quarter record and up 20% over the first quarter of 2024. Excluding charges of $0.21 per share related to intangible amortization, $0.04 per share related to a multi-year restructuring program, and $0.02 per share related to acquisitions and divestitures, adjusted earnings per share of $2.72 were a first quarter record and up 1
